Emissions = Fuel × EF1
Here is an explanation of the equation:
Emissions = Mass of CO2 that is emitted
Fuel = Mass or volume of fuel that is combusted
EF1 = CO2 emission factor per mass or volume unit

MT CO2e
Natural gas - 0.0531
Landfill gas - 0.0523
Liquefied petroleum gas - 0.057
#2 fuel oil - 0.0102
#6 fuel oil - 0.0113
Kerosene -  0.0102

대시보드
탄소 계산기 
탄소 배출 사슬 
감축 시나리오 
보고서
